ovdesc.p: This is a LIVE file. The data from ATM.CHG.TABLE will be written here based on the CHG.ID.RULE provided.

desc.p: Description for the table, free field.
YES or NO. If set to YES. Separate FT will be raised else the data provided below will be sent in the Main OFS Request.
Message Type Indicator of the ISO Message.
Processing Code for the ISO Message.
BIN No which has to be charged.
This field stores the records Id which will be created in ATM.SPLIT.CHG.TABLE
Stores the Amount to be charged.
Stores the Percentage of amount to be charged.
Stores the Commission type record name.
Stores whether the Account type is CUST or IA.
For future use for local references.
